INSERT ALL INTO EXPEND_RESOLUTION( RESOLUTION_NO, COM_RESOLUTION_CODE, INITIATIVE_DATE, DEPARTMENT_CODE, MANAGER_NO, MANAGER_POSITION, EXPEND_PURPOSE, EXPEND_DATE, ACCOUNT_TITLE_CODE, EXPEND_SUMMARY, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, APPROVAL_STATUS, PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, EVIDENCE_CODE, COM_CODE, VENDER_CODE ) VALUES( SEQ_EXPEND_RESOLUTION.NEXTVAL, #{comCode}, #{initiativeDate}, #{departmentCode}, #{managerNo}, #{managerPosition}, #{expendPurpose}, #{expendDate}, #{accountTitleCode}, #{expendSummary}, #{createUser}, SYSDATE, 'N', #{paymentTypeCode}, #{evidenceCode}, #{comCode}, #{detailVenderCode01} ) INTO APPROVALER_INFO( APPR_INFO_CODE, APPR_EMP_CODE, APPR_EMP_POSITION, EXPEND_RESOLUTION, EMPLOYEE_CODE, APPR_STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_APPROVALER_INFO.NEXTVAL, #{apprEmpCode}, #{apprEmpPosition}, SEQ_EXPEND_RESOLUTION.CURRVAL, '0', 'N' ) INTO EXPEND_RESOLUTION_DETAIL( EXPEND_DETAIL_NO, EXPEND_DATE, BRIEF, VENDER_CODE, PRICE, MEMO, EXPEND_RESOLUTION_NO ) VALUES( (SELECT GET_SEQ_EXPEND() FROM DUAL), #{detailDate01}, #{detailBrief01}, #{detailVenderCode01}, #{detailPrice01}, #{detailMemo01}, SEQ_EXPEND_RESOLUTION.CURRVAL )
INTO EXPEND_RESOLUTION_DETAIL( EXPEND_DETAIL_NO, EXPEND_DATE, BRIEF, VENDER_CODE, PRICE, MEMO, EXPEND_RESOLUTION_NO ) VALUES( (SELECT GET_SEQ_EXPEND() FROM DUAL), #{detailDate02}, #{detailBrief02}, #{detailVenderCode02}, #{detailPrice02}, #{detailMemo02}, SEQ_EXPEND_RESOLUTION.CURRVAL )
INTO EXPEND_RESOLUTION_DETAIL( EXPEND_DETAIL_NO, EXPEND_DATE, BRIEF, VENDER_CODE, PRICE, MEMO, EXPEND_RESOLUTION_NO ) VALUES( (SELECT GET_SEQ_EXPEND() FROM DUAL), #{detailDate03}, #{detailBrief03}, #{detailVenderCode03}, #{detailPrice03}, #{detailMemo03}, SEQ_EXPEND_RESOLUTION.CURRVAL )

mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME FROM DEPARTMENT ORDER BY 1
SELECT ACCOUNT_CODE, ACCOUNT_TITLE, CHARACTER, REALATION, COM_CODE, ACCOUNT_SYSTEM FROM ACCOUNT_TITLE ORDER BY 1

SELECT COM_INNER_ID_NUM, COM_CODE, J.POSITION_CODE, ID, PWD, EMAIL, NAME, FILE_NAME, J.POSITION_NAME FROM COM_INNER_ID C JOIN JOB_POSITION J ON (C.POSITION_CODE = J.POSITION_CODE) WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} ORDER BY 1

SELECT E.RESOLUTION_NO, E.COM_RESOLUTION_CODE, E.INITIATIVE_DATE, E.DEPARTMENT_CODE, E.MANAGER_NO, E.MANAGER_POSITION, E.EXPEND_PURPOSE, TO_CHAR(E.EXPEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPEND_DATE, A.ACCOUNT_TITLE AS ACCOUNT_TITLE_CODE, E.EXPEND_SUMMARY, E.CREATE_USER, TO_CHAR(E.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, E.APPROVAL_STATUS, E.PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, E.EVIDENCE_CODE, E.COM_CODE, CID.NAME MANAGER_NAME FROM EXPEND_RESOLUTION E JOIN ACCOUNT_TITLE A ON E.ACCOUNT_TITLE_CODE = A.ACCOUNT_CODE JOIN COM_INNER_ID CID ON E.MANAGER_NO = CID.COM_INNER_ID_NUM WHERE E.COM_CODE = #{ comCode } ORDER BY E.CREATE_DATE

SELECT E.RESOLUTION_NO, E.COM_RESOLUTION_CODE, E.INITIATIVE_DATE, DEPT.DEPT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT_CODE, CID.NAME AS MANAGER_NO, E.MANAGER_POSITION, E.EXPEND_PURPOSE, TO_CHAR(E.EXPEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPEND_DATE, A.ACCOUNT_TITLE AS ACCOUNT_TITLE_CODE, E.EXPEND_SUMMARY, E.CREATE_USER, E.CREATE_DATE, E.APPROVAL_STATUS, E.PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, E.EVIDENCE_CODE, E.COM_CODE, CID.FILE_NAME AS MANAGER_SIGN FROM EXPEND_RESOLUTION E JOIN ACCOUNT_TITLE A ON E.ACCOUNT_TITLE_CODE = A.ACCOUNT_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT DEPT ON DEPT.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPARTMENT_CODE JOIN COM_INNER_ID CID ON CID.COM_INNER_ID_NUM = E.MANAGER_NO WHERE E.RESOLUTION_NO = #{expendResolutionNo}

SELECT D.EXPEND_DETAIL_NO AS EXPEND_DETAIL_NO, D.EXPEND_DATE AS DETAIL_DATE, D.BRIEF AS DETAIL_BRIEF, D.VENDER_CODE AS DETAIL_VENDER_CODE, D.PRICE AS DETAIL_PRICE, D.MEMO AS DETAIL_MEMO, D.EXPEND_RESOLUTION_NO AS EXPEND_RESOLUTION_NO FROM EXPEND_RESOLUTION E JOIN ACCOUNT_TITLE A ON E.ACCOUNT_TITLE_CODE = A.ACCOUNT_CODE JOIN EXPEND_RESOLUTION_DETAIL D ON E.RESOLUTION_NO = D.EXPEND_RESOLUTION_NO WHERE E.RESOLUTION_NO = #{expendResolutionNo}

SELECT VENDER_CODE, COM_CODE, BIZ_REG_NUM, VENDER_NAME, BOSS_NAME, SELL_WAY, SELL_TARGET, VENDER_ADDRESS, VENDER_TEL, DEPARTMENT_INCHARGE, COM_MANAGER_TEL, REMARKS, STATUS, VENDER_FAX, ACCOUNT_HOLDER, ACCOUNT_NUM, PERSONAL_NUM, COM_MANAGER_EMAIL, BANK_CODE, FARMERS_STATUS, VENDER_TYPE FROM VENDER V WHERE COM_CODE = #{ comCode }
